name: Bake Shop Drop
summary:
Bake Shop Drop is a falling block puzzle game originally dedicated as a Facebook application game.

The game uses a pastry, where all blocks use pastry representations from chocolate chip cookies, red cup cakes, strawberry glazed donuts, and a yellow something with eyes; all the manner of delight to one's cholesterol level. The game has various levels which may progressed by completing a level once to unlock the next. Previous levels may be visited and replayed at any time. A player vs. player (PvP) feature is available via classic mode.
